title: Float
description: Allows the mob to stay afloat while swimming.

sink_with_passengers.title: Sink With Passengers
sink_with_passengers.description: If true, the mob will keep sinking as long as it has passengers.

chance_per_tick_to_float.title: Chance Per Tick To Float
chance_per_tick_to_float.description: The chance per tick to cause an upward impulse.

time_under_water_to_dismount_passengers.title: Time Under Water To Dismount Passengers
time_under_water_to_dismount_passengers.description: Time in seconds that a floating vehicles head can be underwater before it causes its passengers to dismount.
